# composeæ–‡ä»¶

version: "3.2"

services:
  nacos:
    image: nacos/nacos-server
    environment:
      MODE: standalone
    ports:
      - "8848:8848"
  mysql:
    image: mysql:5.7.25
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: 123
    volumes:
      - "$PWD/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql"
      - "$PWD/mysql/conf:/etc/mysql/conf.d/"
  userservice:
    build: ./user-service
  orderservice:
    build: ./order-service
  gateway:
    build: ./gateway
    ports:
      - "10010:10010"

å¯ä»¥çœ‹åˆ°ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åŒ…å«5ä¸ªserviceæœåŠ¡ï¼š
